Entries.default:
"Quench your thirst on your way up the mountain?"

Emaita inclines her head and gestures to a wagon loaded with kegs.
"Spirits and the like. No one this side of the slope will scorn you for a little indulgence." She smiles.

"Between us... folks tend to linger and spend coin in Periki's when they've had a few.

"Good for business, I say."
